verses.verse: At that time <S%H6256><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6458><s%> "Cut two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like the first, <S%H7223><s%> and come up <S%H5927><s%> to me onto the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of wood. <S%H6086><s%>

I will write <S%H3789><s%> on the tables <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were on the first <S%H7223><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> which you broke, <S%H7665><s%> and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> them in the ark. <S%H727><s%>"

So I made <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and cut <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like the first, <S%H7223><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> onto the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> having the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> in my hand. <S%H3027><s%>

He wrote <S%H3789><s%> on the tables, <S%H3871><s%> according to the first <S%H7223><s%> writing, <S%H4385><s%> the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments, <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly: <S%H6951><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave them to me. <S%H5414><s%>

I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> which I had made; <S%H6213><s%> and there they are as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded me. <S%H6680><s%>

(The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> from Beeroth Bene Jaakan <S%H885><s%> to Moserah. <S%H4149><s%> There Aaron <S%H175><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and there he was buried; <S%H6912><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> ministered in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office in his place.
From there they traveled <S%H5265><s%> to Gudgodah; <S%H1412><s%> and from Gudgodah <S%H1412><s%> to Jotbathah, <S%H3193><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>

At that time <S%H6256><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> set apart <S%H914><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> to him, <S%H1288><s%> and to bless in his name, <S%H8034><s%> to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

Therefore Levi <S%H3878><s%> has no portion <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with his brothers; <S%H251><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> according as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke to him. <S%H1696><s%>)

I stayed <S%H5975><s%> on the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> as at the first <S%H7223><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights: <S%H3915><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> to me that time <S%H6471><s%> also; <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh would <S%H14><s%> not destroy you. <S%H7843><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6965><s%> "Arise, take <S%H3212><s%> your journey <S%H4550><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> and they shall go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give to them. <S%H5414><s%>"

Now, <S%H3478><s%> Israel, what does Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> require <S%H7592><s%> of you, <S%H3372><s%> but to fear Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in all his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to love <S%H157><s%> him, <S%H5647><s%> and to serve Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul, <S%H5315><s%>
to keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> for your good? <S%H2896><s%>
Behold, <S%H3068><s%> to Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> belongs heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> with all that is therein.

Only Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had a delight <S%H2836><s%> in your fathers <S%H1><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> them, <S%H977><s%> and he chose their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H5971><s%> even you above all peoples, as at this day. <S%H3117><s%>
Circumcise <S%H4135><s%> therefore the foreskin <S%H6190><s%> of your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and be no more stiff-necked. <S%H6203><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he is God <S%H430><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> and Lord <S%H113><s%> of lords, <S%H113><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> the mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and the awesome, <S%H3372><s%> who doesn't <S%H5375><s%> respect persons, <S%H6440><s%> nor takes <S%H3947><s%> reward. <S%H7810><s%>

He does execute <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> for the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widow, <S%H490><s%> and loves <S%H157><s%> the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> in giving <S%H5414><s%> him food <S%H3899><s%> and clothing. <S%H8071><s%>
Therefore love <S%H157><s%> the foreigner; <S%H1616><s%> for you were foreigners <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

You shall fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him; <S%H1692><s%> and you shall cling to him, <S%H7650><s%> and you shall swear by his name. <S%H8034><s%>

He is your praise, <S%H8416><s%> and he is your God, <S%H430><s%> who has done <S%H6213><s%> for you these great <S%H1419><s%> and awesome things, <S%H3372><s%> which your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen. <S%H7200><s%>

Your fathers <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with seventy <S%H7657><s%> persons; <S%H5315><s%> and now Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has made <S%H7760><s%> you as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>
